title: Boku to Furusato Restaurant
original_name: 僕とフルサトレストラン
sinopse: Somehow I, Tomaru Harukaze, was sent by my mother to work in a typical restaurant located in her hometown. "Restaurant Bell" is full of waiters which each has their own unique habits. How could I, such shy and timid person, be able to friendly serve the guests in the restaurant?
